dcterms:description: The AMI meeting corpus is used for training gender-dependent models, consisting of dedicated annotations along with time-stamps for speech perturbed with emotions and voice-quality.
dcterms:title: AMI Meeting Corpus

dcterms:description: The Buckeye corpus of conversational speech is used for training gender-dependent models, focusing on speech perturbed with emotions and voice-quality.
dcterms:title: Buckeye Corpus of Conversational Speech
